tag_professor: Gives good feedback (6)  Tough Grader (4)  Get ready to read (4)  Caring (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Respected (2)  Participation matters (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Paquita knows the material very well and tries her best to explain it to students who don\'t pay attention as classes aren\'t really reflected on tests. Most test questions are from online homework which is essential to do well in the course along with a good Excel sheet. There is online participation in class, homework, 2 midterms and a final.

comments: I found her a little bit difficult to understand with her accent (though not the worst I\'ve ever had). Lectures were pretty boring and dry but that can be attributed to the subject so it\'s hard to tell. She also had a habit of calling on people and asking for answers which sucked. She was really nice though and always available outside of class

comments: Difficult to understand and doesn\'t give clear explanations. Seems unsure of whats going on sometimes. Tries hard but just isn\'t a very effective professor. Course is fairly hard though they were in the midst when I was taking it but I still got an A! So she would be brutal if you\'re not an A student.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (6)  Tough Grader (4)  Get ready to read (4)  Caring (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Respected (2)  Participation matters (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: It is evident that she is trying to teach, but unfortunately her accent makes it quite difficult to understand what she\'s trying to say. The midterms were online and open book, and you have more than enough time to look through the textbook to figure out how to answer the questions. The final ended up not being open book.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (6)  Tough Grader (4)  Get ready to read (4)  Caring (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Respected (2)  Participation matters (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: She doesn\'t really do much. The whole course is ran online and there are a bunch of TAs to answer questions. She doesn\'t even have office hours and all she really does is read off the slides and asks questions before explaining anything which is just a waste of time. The course is not hard but the way it\'s ran is just awful

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (6)  Tough Grader (4)  Get ready to read (4)  Caring (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Respected (2)  Participation matters (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: While often unclear and boring, the course is not hard and the exams are extremely fair. She\'s also very nice, is pretty lenient in some situations, and wants her students to succeed. If you can do and understand the homework questions, there\'s really not too much difficulty in the course.

comments: I find that she goes very quickly over concepts and doesn\'t tend to go over concepts very clearly despite students asking her to repeat certain questions. She seems nice, but seems to be going at her own pace regardless of what the students want/need. Her accent is also very hard to understand, but that can\'t really be helped.
